actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit State legislators to deduct certain living expenses.

summary.text: Provides that a State legislator shall be eligible for the tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for living expenses (up to $300) presently allowed to Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit State legislators to deduct certain living expenses.
